original_text: Then Herod felt very sad. Because he had made a special promise, he did not want to refuse her. All his visitors had heard him.
korean_text: 왕이 심히 근심하나 자기가 맹세한 것과 그 앉은 자들로 인하여 그를 거절할 수 없는지라

sentences.original_text: Because he had made a special promise
he did not want to refuse her
All his visitors had heard him
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 모든 방문객들이 그의 말을 들었다
